locale.name: C
locale.long: List of strings containing the available palettes.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The string that the user had selected when the applet was last used. This string will be displayed when the user starts the applet.

locale.name: C
locale.short: DEPRECATED - Characters shown on applet startup

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set the CPU to monitor. In a single processor system you don't have to change it.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A 0 value means to show the applet in graphic mode (pixmap only), 1 to show the applet in text mode (not to show the pixmap) and 2 to show the applet in graphic and text mode.

locale.name: C
locale.short: The type of text to display (if the text is enabled).
locale.long: A 0 value means to show cpu frequency, 1 to show frequency and units, and 2 to show percentage instead of frequency.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Interval timeout to check mount point status
locale.long: Time in seconds between status updates

locale.name: es
locale.long: Si est activada, usa la cancelacin de eco

locale.name: es
locale.long: Si est activado, se usar la deteccin de silencio con los cdecs que la soporten

locale.name: es
locale.long: Tamao mximo del bfer de jitter para recepcin de sonido (en ms)

locale.name: es
locale.short: La lista de cdecs de sonido
locale.long: La lista de cdecs de sonido

locale.name: es
locale.short: Mxima tasa de bits de recepcin de vdeo
locale.long: La mxima tasa de bits de recepcin de vdeo en kbit/s. Este valor se enviar al punto final que puede ajustar (de soportarlo) su tasa de bits de transmisin si est por encima del valor enviado.

locale.name: es
locale.short: Mxima tasa de bits de transmisin de vdeo
locale.long: La mxima tasa de bits de transmisin de vdeo en kbit/s. La calidad del vdeo y el nmero de imgenes transmitidas por segundo (dependiendo del cdec) se ajustarn dinmicamente sobre su mnimo durante las llamadas, intentando minimizar el ancho de banda al valor seleccionado.

locale.name: es
locale.short: La lista de cdecs de vdeo
locale.long: La lista de cdecs de vdeo

locale.name: es
locale.long: Indica si se prefiere sostener la tasa de cuadros mxima o reducirla para mantener un mnimo nivel de calidad (espacial) para todos los cuadros. 0: mxima calidad mnima, 31: mnima calidad mnima.

locale.name: es
locale.long: El histrico de las ltimas 100 llamadas

locale.name: es
locale.long: Lista de servidores LDAP configurados

locale.name: es
locale.short: Lista de los grupos agrupados en la lista

locale.name: es
locale.long: Si est activada, se mostrarn los contactos desconectados en la lista

locale.name: es
locale.long: Seleccionar el dispositivo de entrada de sonido que usar

locale.name: es
locale.long: Seleccionar el dispositivo de salida de sonido que usar

locale.name: es
locale.long: El nmero de canal de vdeo que usar (cmara, tv, )

locale.name: es
locale.long: Muestra las imgenes desde su dispositivo de cmara

locale.name: es
locale.long: Seleccionar el formato para cmaras de vdeo. (No se aplica a la mayora de cmaras USB)

locale.name: es
locale.long: Seleccionar el dispositivo de entrada de vdeo a usar. Si ocurre un error al usar este dispositivo se transmitir una imagen de prueba.

locale.name: es
locale.long: La mxima tasa de cuadros transmitidos en cuadros/s. Esta tasa puede que no se alcance en caso de que se configurase una calidad mnima de TSTO menor que 31 y la tasa de bits seleccionada no sea suficiente para soportar esta mnima calidad.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Seleccionar el tamao de la imagen transmitida: pequea (QCIF 176x144) o grande (CIF 352x288)

locale.name: es
locale.short: Tipo de red seleccionada en el asistente
locale.long: 0: 56Kbps, 1: RDSI, 2: DSL128, 3: DSL512, 4: LAN, 5: Personalizado

locale.name: es
locale.long: Si est activado, permite responder automticamente las llamadas entrantes

locale.name: es
locale.long: Rechazar o desviar automticamente las llamadas entrantes si no se da respuesta despus del tiempo especificado (en segundos)

locale.name: es
locale.short: Activar la deteccin de STUN en la red
locale.long: Activar la configuracin automtica de red con los resultados del test de STUN

locale.name: es
locale.long: El servidor STUN que usar en el soporte STUN. STUN es una tecnologa que permite ir a travs de algunos tipos de puertas de enlace NAT.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Introduzca su nombre completo

locale.name: es
locale.long: La informacin de estado larga

locale.name: es
locale.long: La informacin de estado corta

locale.name: es
locale.short: El sonido para el tono de ocupado
locale.long: El sonido que ser reproducido al final de las llamadas o al llamar a alguien que est ocupado, si est activado

locale.name: es
locale.long: Si se activa, el sonido seleccionado se reproducir al final de las llamadas o cuando se llame a alguien que est ocupado

locale.name: es
locale.short: Reproducir un sonido para las llamadas entrantes
locale.long: Si est activado, el sonido seleccionado se reproducir al tener una llamada entrante

locale.name: es
locale.short: Reproducir un sonido al llegar un mensaje nuevo
locale.long: El sonido seleccionado se reproducir cuando se reciba un mensaje instantneo nuevo, si est activado

locale.name: es
locale.short: Reproducir un sonido al llegar un correo de voz nuevo
locale.long: El sonido seleccionado se reproducir cuando se reciba un correo de voz, si est activado

locale.name: es
locale.long: El sonido seleccionado se reproducir cuando se llame a alguien, si est activado

locale.name: es
locale.long: El sonido que se reproducir en llamadas entrantes, si est activado

locale.name: es
locale.short: El sonido para el mensaje instantneo nuevo
locale.long: El sonido que se reproducir cuando haya un mensaje instantneo nuevo, si est activado

locale.name: es
locale.short: El sonido de correo de voz nuevo
locale.long: El sonido que se reproducir cuando haya un correo de voz nuevo, si est activado

locale.name: es
locale.short: Dispositivo de salida de sonido alternativo
locale.long: Seleccionar un dispositivo alternativo de salida de sonido para utilizarlo en los eventos de sonido.

locale.name: es
locale.short: El sonido para el tono de llamada
locale.long: El sonido que se reproducir al llamar a alguien, si est activado

locale.long: Tamao de la ventana de la libreta de direcciones

locale.long: Posicin en la pantalla de la ventana de charla

locale.long: Tamao de la ventana de charla

locale.name: es
locale.short: Cambie la seccin del panel en la ventana principal
locale.long: Cambiar la seccin del panel de la ventana principal (0=Contactos, 1=Teclado, 2=Histrico de llamadas)

locale.name: es
locale.short: Posicin en la pantalla de la ventana principal
locale.long: Posicin en la pantalla de la ventana principal

locale.long: Posicin en la pantalla de la ventana de preferencias

locale.long: El tamao de la ventana de vdeo remoto

locale.name: es
locale.long: Permitir que Ekiga vuelva al escalado de software de imagen-en-imagen si el soporte de hardware no est disponible. Si est establecido como falso, Ekiga no intentar abrir el PIP si el soporte de hardware no est disponible.

locale.name: es
locale.short: Deshabilitar la aceleracin del hardware de vdeo
locale.long: Esta clave desactiva la aceleracin de hardware DirectX (en win32) y XVideo (en Linux)

locale.name: es
locale.short: Colocar ventanas mostrando vdeo por encima de otras ventanas durante las llamadas
locale.long: Colocar ventanas mostrando vdeo por encima de otras ventanas durante las llamadas

locale.name: es
locale.short: Especificar el algoritmo de software de escalado
locale.long: Especifica el algoritmo de software de escalado: 0: valor ms cercano, 2 valor ms cercano con filtro de caja, 2: filtrado bilineal, 3: filtrado hiperblico. No se aplica en sistemas Windows.

locale.name: es
locale.long: La vista de vdeo predeterminada (0: Local, 1: Remoto, 2: Ambos, 3: Ambos en una ventana separada)

locale.name: es
locale.short: La vista de vdeo antes de cambiar a pantalla completa
locale.long: El vdeo antes de cambiar a pantalla completa (los mismos valores que vista de vdeo)

locale.name: es
locale.long: El valor en porcentaje de la ampliacin para aplicar a las imgenes mostradas en la IGU principal (puede ser 0.50, 1.00 2.00)

locale.name: es
locale.short: Posicin en la pantalla de la ventana de ajustes de vdeo
locale.long: Posicin en la pantalla de la ventana de ajustes de vdeo

locale.name: es
locale.short: Tamao de la ventana de ajustes de vdeo
locale.long: Tamao de la ventana de ajustes de vdeo

locale.name: es
locale.long: La lista de cuentas a las cuales Ekiga debera registrarse

locale.name: es
locale.short: Byte del tipo de servicio (TOS) en paquetes RTP IP salientes
locale.long: El byte del tipo de servicio (TOS) en paquetes RTP IP salientes. La red usa este byte para proporcional alguna calidad de servicio (QoS). El valor predeterminado 184 (0xB8) corresponde con el PHB reenvo acelerado (Expedited Forwarding, EF), tal y como est definido en el RFC 3246.

locale.name: es
locale.short: Siempre desviar las llamadas al equipo indicado
locale.long: Si est activado, todas las llamadas entrantes sern desviadas al equipo especificado ms abajo

locale.name: es
locale.short: Desviar las llamadas al equipo indicado si se est ocupado
locale.long: Si est activado, todas las llamadas entrantes sern desviadas al equipo especificado ms abajo tanto si ya se encuentra realizando una llamada como si se encuentra en el modo Ocupado

locale.name: es
locale.short: Desviar las llamadas al equipo indicado si no hay respuesta
locale.long: Si est activado, todas las llamadas entrantes sern desviadas al equipo especificado ms abajo si no contesta a la llamada

locale.name: es
locale.long: Seleccionar el modo para el envo de DTMF. Los valores pueden ser 0 (para String), 1 (para Tone), 2 (para RFC2833), o 3 (para Q.931) (el predeterminado es String). Si se seleccionan valores distintos de String se desactiva la charla textual.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Esto activa H.245 primitivo en la configuracin

locale.name: es
locale.long: La conexin se establecer en modo Inicio rpido. Inicio rpido es un modo nuevo de iniciar llamadas ms rpido y se introdujo en H.323v2. No est soportado por Netmeeting, y usarlo conjuntamente con tneles H.245 puede causar cuelgues en diferentes versiones de Netmeeting

locale.name: es
locale.long: Esto activa la capacidad H.239 para roles de video adicionales

locale.name: es
locale.long: Esto activa el modo Tnel H.245. En este modo los mensajes H.245 se encapsulan en el canal H.225 (puerto 1720). Esto permite ahorrar un puerto TCP durante las llamadas. El Tnel H.245 se introdujo en H.323v2 y Netmeeting no lo soporta. El uso a la vez de Inicio rpido y Tnel H.245 puede colgar algunas versiones de Netmeeting.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Introduzca aqu el equipo al que deben ser desviadas las llamadas en los casos seleccionados arriba

locale.name: es
locale.long: El puerto en el que escuchar las conexiones entrantes. Ekiga necesita reiniciarse para que el valor nuevo surta efecto.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Seleccionar el rol de vdeo H.239. Los valores pueden ser 0 vdeo extendido desactivado), 1 (para permitir mscara de rol por contenido), 2 (para forzar presentacin) o 3 (para forzar rol en vivo)

locale.name: es
locale.long: El rango de puertos TCP que Ekiga usar para el canal H.323 H.245. Este rango de puertos no tiene efecto si ambos participantes de la conferencia estn usando tneles H.245.

locale.name: es
locale.long: El rango de puertos UDP que Ekiga usar.

locale.name: es
locale.short: Tiempo de expiracin de la vinculacin NAT
locale.long: Introduzca el nmero de segundos tras el cual Ekiga intentar refrescar la vinculacin NAT cuando se use STUN

locale.name: es
locale.long: Seleccionar el modo para envos DTMF. Los valores pueden ser 0 (para RFC2833), y 1 (para INFO)

locale.name: es
locale.long: Introduzca aqu el equipo al que deben ser desviadas las llamadas en los casos seleccionados arriba

locale.name: es
locale.long: El puerto en el que escuchar las conexiones entrantes. Ekiga necesita reiniciarse para que el valor nuevo surta efecto

locale.name: es
locale.long: El Proxy de salida SIP para usar en las llamadas salientes

locale.name: C
locale.short: Directory in which the theme is located

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the keyboard and mouse grabbing should be turned off. This will make it possible for other X applications to listen to keyboard input events, thus making it not possible to shield from malicious applications which may be running.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Display information message when no password is needed
locale.long: This option determines whether a message dialog will be displayed informing the user that the program is being run without the need of a password being asked for some reason.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Grab keyboard and mouse even if -g has been passed as argument on the command line.

locale.name: C
locale.long: This option will make gksu prompt the user if he wants to have the screen grabbed before entering the password. Notice that this only has an effect if force-grab is disabled.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyring to which passwords will be saved
locale.long: The name of the keyring gksu should use. Usual values are "session", which saves the password for the session, and "default", which saves the password with no timeout.

locale.name: C
locale.long: gksu can save the password you type to the gnome-keyring so you'll not be asked everytime

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether sudo should be the default backend method. This method is otherwise accessed though the -S switch or by running 'gksudo' instead of 'gksu'.

locale.name: es
locale.long: A subset of possible encodings are presented in the Encoding submenu. This is a list of encodings to appear there. The special encoding name "current" means to display the encoding of the current locale.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to ask for confirmation when closing terminal windows
locale.long: Whether to ask for confirmation when closing a terminal window which has more than one open tab.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Profile to use for new terminals
locale.long: Profile to be used when opening a new window or tab. Must be in profile_list.

locale.name: C
locale.long: List of profiles known to gnome-terminal. The list contains strings naming subdirectories relative to /apps/gnome-terminal/profiles.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether the standard GTK shortcut for menubar access is enabled
locale.long: Normally you can access the menubar with F10. This can also be customized via gtkrc (gtk-menu-bar-accel = "whatever"). This option allows the standard menubar accelerator to be disabled.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether the menubar has access keys
locale.long: Whether to have Alt+letter access keys for the menubar. They may interfere with some applications run inside the terminal so it's possible to turn them off.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to close a tab
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for closing a tab. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to close a window
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for closing a window. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for copying selected text to the clipboard. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Accelerator key to detach current tab. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to toggle full screen mode
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for toggling full screen mode. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for launching help. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Accelerator to move the current tab to the left.
locale.long: Accelerator key to move the current tab to the left. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Accelerator to move the current tab to the right.
locale.long: Accelerator key to move the current tab to the right. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to create a new profile
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for bringing up the dialog for profile creation. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to open a new tab
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for opening a new tab. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to open a new window
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for opening a new window. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to switch to the next tab
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key to switch to the next tab. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for pasting the contents of the clipboard into the terminal. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to reset and clear the terminal

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to save the current tab contents to file
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key to save the current tab contents to a file. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to set the terminal title
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key to set the terminal title. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to toggle the visibility of the menubar
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key to toggle the visibility of the menubar. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to make font larger
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for making font larger. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to make font normal-size
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for making font the normal size. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Keyboard shortcut to make font smaller
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for making font smaller. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, allow applications in the terminal to make text boldface.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to send keystrokes for alternate screen scrolling
locale.long: If true, send Up/Down keystrokes for scrolling when using alternate screen or when scrolling is restricted.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default color of terminal background, as a color specification (can be HTML-style hex digits, or a color name such as "red").

locale.name: C
locale.short: How much to darken the background image
locale.long: A value between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating how much to darken the background image. 0.0 means no darkness, 1.0 means fully dark. In the current implementation, there are only two levels of darkness possible, so the setting behaves as a boolean, where 0.0 disables the darkening effect.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Filename of a background image.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Type of terminal background. May be "solid" for a solid color, "image" for an image, or "transparent" for either real transparency if a compositing window manager is running, or pseudo-transparency otherwise.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Sets what code the backspace key generates. Possible values are "ascii-del" for the ASCII DEL character, "control-h" for Control-H (AKA the ASCII BS character), "escape-sequence" for the escape sequence typically bound to backspace or delete. "ascii-del" is normally considered the correct setting for the Backspace key.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Default color of bold text in the terminal
locale.long: Default color of bold text in the terminal, as a color specification (can be HTML-style hex digits, or a color name such as "red"). This is ignored if bold_color_same_as_fg is true.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether bold text should use the same color as normal text
locale.long: If true, boldface text will be rendered using the same color as normal text.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The possible values are "system" to use the global cursor blinking settings, or "on" or "off" to set the mode explicitly.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The possible values are "block" to use a block cursor, "ibeam" to use a vertical line cursor, or "underline" to use an underline cursor.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Custom command to use instead of the shell
locale.long: Run this command in place of the shell, if use_custom_command is true.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to show menubar in new windows/tabs
locale.long: True if the menubar should be shown in new windows, for windows/tabs with this profile.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Number of columns in newly created terminal windows. Has no effect if use_custom_default_size is not enabled.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Number of rows in newly created terminal windows. Has no effect if use_custom_default_size is not enabled.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Sets what code the delete key generates. Possible values are "ascii-del" for the ASCII DEL character, "control-h" for Control-H (AKA the ASCII BS character), "escape-sequence" for the escape sequence typically bound to backspace or delete. "escape-sequence" is normally considered the correct setting for the Delete key.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Default encoding. Can be either "current" to use the current locale's encoding, or else any of the known encodings.

locale.name: C
locale.short: What to do with the terminal when the child command exits
locale.long: Possible values are "close" to close the terminal, and "restart" to restart the command.

locale.name: C
locale.long: An Pango font name. Examples are "Sans 12" or "Monospace Bold 14".

locale.name: C
locale.short: Default color of text in the terminal
locale.long: Default color of text in the terminal, as a color specification (can be HTML-style hex digits, or a color name such as "red").

locale.name: C
locale.long: Icon to use for tabs/windows containing this profile.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to launch the command in the terminal as a login shell
locale.long: If true, the command inside the terminal will be launched as a login shell. (argv[0] will have a hyphen in front of it.)

locale.name: C
locale.long: Terminals have a 16-color palette that applications inside the terminal can use. This is that palette, in the form of a colon-separated list of color names. Color names should be in hex format e.g. "#FF00FF"

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, scroll the background image with the foreground text; if false, keep the image in a fixed position and scroll the text above it.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to scroll to the bottom when a key is pressed
locale.long: If true, pressing a key jumps the scrollbar to the bottom.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to scroll to the bottom when there's new output
locale.long: If true, whenever there's new output the terminal will scroll to the bottom.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Number of lines to keep in scrollback
locale.long: Number of scrollback lines to keep around. You can scroll back in the terminal by this number of lines; lines that don't fit in the scrollback are discarded. If scrollback_unlimited is true, this value is ignored.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether an unlimited number of lines should be kept in scrollback
locale.long: If true, scrollback lines will never be discarded. The scrollback history is stored on disk temporarily, so this may cause the system to run out of disk space if there is a lot of output to the terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Where to put the terminal scrollbar. Possibilities are "left", "right", and "hidden".

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, don't make a noise when applications send the escape sequence for the terminal bell.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Title to display for the terminal window or tab. This title may be replaced by or combined with the title set by the application inside the terminal, depending on the title_mode setting.

locale.name: C
locale.short: What to do with dynamic title
locale.long: If the application in the terminal sets the title (most typically people have their shell set up to do this), the dynamically-set title can erase the configured title, go before it, go after it, or replace it. The possible values are "replace", "before", "after", and "ignore".

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to update login records when launching terminal command
locale.long: If true, the system login records utmp and wtmp will be updated when the command inside the terminal is launched.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to run a custom command instead of the shell
locale.long: If true, the value of the custom_command setting will be used in place of running a shell.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to use custom terminal size for new windows
locale.long: If true, newly created terminal windows will have custom size specified by default_size_columns and default_size_rows.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to use the system font
locale.long: If true, the terminal will use the desktop-global standard font if it's monospace (and the most similar font it can come up with otherwise).

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to use the colors from the theme for the terminal widget
locale.long: If true, the theme color scheme used for text entry boxes will be used for the terminal, instead of colors provided by the user.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Human-readable name of the profile.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Characters that are considered "part of a word"
locale.long: When selecting text by word, sequences of these characters are considered single words. Ranges can be given as "A-Z". Literal hyphen (not expressing a range) should be the first character given.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Graph color for user-related CPU activity

locale.name: C
locale.short: Graph color for system-related CPU activity

locale.name: C
locale.short: Graph color for nice-related CPU activity

locale.name: C
locale.short: Graph color for iowait related CPU activity

locale.name: C
locale.short: Background color for disk load graph

locale.name: C
locale.short: Graph color for user-related memory usage

locale.name: C
locale.short: Graph color for input network activity

locale.name: C
locale.short: Graph color for output network activity

locale.name: C
locale.short: Graph color for loopback network usage

locale.name: C
locale.long: For horizontal panels, the width of the graphs in pixels. For vertical panels, this is the height of the graphs.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Graph color for user-related swap usage

locale.name: C
locale.short: The desktop description file to execute as the system monitor

locale.name: es
locale.long: Qu vista mostrar en la interfaz de usuario.

locale.name: es
locale.short: Muestra das no estndar en la vista de Gantt
locale.long: Indica si se deben mostrar los das no estndar en la vista de Gantt.

locale.name: es
locale.short: Resalta la ruta crtica en la vista de Gantt
locale.long: Indica si se deben resaltar las tareas junto con la ruta crtica en la vista de Gantt.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Indica si la impresin de la vista de Gantt est activada.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Indica si la impresin de la vista de recursos est activada.

locale.name: es
locale.short: Resalta la ruta crtica en la vista de tareas
locale.long: Indica si se debe resaltar las tareas a lo largo de la ruta crtica en la vista de tareas.

locale.name: es
locale.long: Indica si la impresin de la vista de tareas est activada.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default color for new sticky notes. This should be in html hex specification, for example "#30FF50".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default font for new sticky notes. This should be a Pango Font Name, for example "Sans Italic 10".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default font color for new sticky notes. This should be in html hex specification, for example "#000000".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default height for new sticky notes in pixels.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default width for new sticky notes in pixels.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to ask for confirmation when deleting a note
locale.long: Empty notes are always deleted without confirmation.

locale.name: C
locale.long: By default, sticky notes are given the current date as the title when they are created. This format is used; anything that can be parsed by strftime() is valid.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to hide all notes when the desktop is selected
locale.long: If this option is enabled, selecting the desktop in any way will automatically hide all the open notes.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to force the default color and font on all notes
locale.long: If this option is enabled, the custom colors and fonts that have been assigned to individual notes will be ignored.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies whether the sticky notes are locked (non-editable) or not.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies whether the sticky notes are visible on ALL workspaces on the desktop, or not.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to use the default system color
locale.long: If this option is disabled, a custom color can be used as the default color for all sticky notes.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether to use the default system font
locale.long: If this option is disabled, a custom font can be used as the default font for all sticky notes.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Ignore multiple presses of the _same_ key within @delay milliseconds.

locale.name: C
locale.short: How long to accelerate in milliseconds
locale.long: How many milliseconds it takes to go from 0 to maximum speed.

locale.name: C
locale.long: How many milliseconds to wait before mouse movement keys start to operate.

locale.name: C
locale.long: How many pixels per second to move at the maximum speed.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Do not accept a key as being pressed unless held for @delay milliseconds.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Beep when a modifier is pressed.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Disable if two keys are pressed at the same time.

locale.name: C
locale.long: List of assistive technology applications to start when logging into the GNOME desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Preferred Mobility assistive technology application to be used for login, menu, or command line.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Start preferred Mobility assistive technology application
locale.long: GNOME to start preferred Mobility assistive technology application during login.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Preferred Visual assistive technology application be used for login, menu, or command line.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Start preferred Visual assistive technology application
locale.long: GNOME to start preferred Visual assistive technology application during login.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default browser for all URLs.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the default browser needs a terminal to run.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the default browser understands netscape remote.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default calendar application

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the default calendar application needs a terminal to run

locale.name: C
locale.long: The application to use for viewing files that require a component to view them. The parameter %s will be replaced by the file's URIs, the parameter %c will be replaced by the component IID.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default tasks application

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the default tasks application needs a terminal to run

locale.name: C
locale.long: The default terminal application to use for applications that require a terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The exec argument to use for the default terminal application.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Window manager to try first. This key has been deprecated since GNOME 2.12.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Fallback window manager if user window manager can't be found. This key has been deprecated since GNOME 2.12.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The number of workspaces the window manager should use This key has been deprecated since GNOME 2.12.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A list with names of the first window manager workspaces. This key has been deprecated since GNOME 2.12.

locale.name: C
locale.long: How to shade the background color. Possible values are "horizontal-gradient", "vertical-gradient", and "solid".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Have GNOME draw the desktop background.

locale.name: C
locale.long: File to use for the background image.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Opacity with which to draw the background picture.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Determines how the image set by wallpaper_filename is rendered. Possible values are "none", "wallpaper", "centered", "scaled", "stretched", "zoom", "spanned".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Left or Top color when drawing gradients, or the solid color.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Right or Bottom color when drawing gradients, not used for solid color.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Theme used for displaying file icons.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether Applications should have accessibility support.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether buttons may display an icon in addition to the button text.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the user can dynamically type a new accelerator when positioned over an active menuitem.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the cursor should blink.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Length of the cursor blink cycle, in milliseconds.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the default font used for reading documents.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether animations should be displayed. Note: This is a global key, it changes the behaviour of the window manager, the panel etc.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Module to use as the filesystem model for the GtkFileChooser widget. Possible values are "gio", "gnome-vfs" and "gtk+".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the default font used by gtk+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the input method module used by GTK+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the GTK+ input method Preedit Style used by gtk+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the GTK+ input method Status Style used by gtk+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Basename of the default theme used by gtk+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Basename of the default theme used by gtk+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Icon theme to use for the panel, nautilus etc.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut to open the menu bars.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the user can detach menubars and move them around.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether menus may display an icon next to a menu entry.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether menus should have a tearoff.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of a monospaced (fixed-width) font for use in locations like terminals.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the context menus of entries and text views should offer to change the input method.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the context menus of entries and text views should offer to insert control characters.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether to display a status bar meter on the right.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the user can detach toolbars and move them around.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Size of icons in toolbars, either "small-toolbar" or "large-toolbar".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Toolbar Style. Valid values are "both", "both-horiz", "icons", and "text".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether to use a custom font in gtk+ applications.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Disable URL and MIME type handlers
locale.long: Prevent running any URL or MIME type handler applications.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user from accessing the terminal or specifying a command line to be executed. For example, this would disable access to the panel's "Run Application" dialog.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user to lock his screen.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user from modifying print settings. For example, this would disable access to all applications' "Print Setup" dialogs.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user from printing. For example, this would disable access to all applications' "Print" dialogs.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user from saving files to disk. For example, this would disable access to all applications' "Save as" dialogs.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user from switching to another account while his session is active.

locale.name: C
locale.long: File name of the bell sound to be played.

locale.name: C
locale.long: possible values are "on", "off", and "custom".

locale.name: C
locale.long: When set to true, GNOME will remember the state of the NumLock LED between sessions.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Font name of the cursor. If unset, the default font is used. This value is only propagated to the X server start of each session, so changing it mid-session won't have an effect until the next time you log in.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Size of the cursor referenced by cursor_theme.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Cursor theme name. Used only by Xservers that support Xcursor, such as XFree86 4.3 and later.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Length of a double click.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Distance before a drag is started.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Swap left and right mouse buttons for left-handed mice.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Highlights the current location of the pointer when the Control key is pressed and released.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Acceleration multiplier for mouse motion. A value of -1 is the system default.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Distance in pixels the pointer must move before accelerated mouse motion is activated. A value of -1 is the system default.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Single click to open icons.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The default mixer device used by the multimedia key bindings.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The default mixer tracks used by the multimedia key bindings.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Enable sound server startup.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether to play sounds on user events.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether to play sounds on input events.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The XDG sound theme to use for event sounds.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Maximum age for thumbnails in the cache, in days. Set to -1 to disable cleaning.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Maximum size of the thumbnail cache, in megabytes. Set to -1 to disable cleaning.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set to true to disable all external thumbnailer programs, independent on whether they are independently disabled/enabled.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether or not the typing break screen can be postponed.

locale.long: Number of minutes that the typing break should last.

locale.long: Number of minutes of typing time before break mode starts.

locale.name: C
locale.long: GStreamer can play audio using any number of output elements. Some possible choices are osssink, esdsink and alsasink. The audiosink can be a partial pipeline instead of just one element.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Describes the selected output element.

locale.name: C
locale.long: GStreamer can record audio using any number of input elements. Some possible choices are osssrc, esdsrc and alsasrc. The audio source can be a partial pipeline instead of just one element.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Describes the selected input element.

locale.name: C
locale.long: GStreamer can play audio using any number of output elements. Some possible choices are osssink, esdsink and alsasink. The audiosink can be a partial pipeline instead of just one element.

locale.name: C
locale.short: description for GStreamer audiosink for Audio/Video Conferencing
locale.long: Describes the selected output element for Audio/Video Conferencing.

locale.name: C
locale.short: GStreamer audiosink for Music and Movies
locale.long: GStreamer can play audio using any number of output elements. Some possible choices are osssink, esdsink and alsasink. The audiosink can be a partial pipeline instead of just one element.

locale.short: description for GStreamer audiosink for Music and Movies

locale.long: GStreamer can play video using any number of output elements. Some possible choices are xvimagesink, ximagesink, sdlvideosink and aasink. The videosink can be a partial pipeline instead of just one element.

locale.name: C
locale.long: GStreamer can record video from any number of input elements. Some possible choices are v4lsrc and videotestsrc. The video source can be a partial pipeline instead of just one element.

locale.name: C
locale.long: GStreamer can put visualization plugins in a pipeline to transform audio stream in video frames. Default is goom but more visualization plugins will be ported soon. The visualization plugin can be a partial pipeline instead of just one element.

value.string: Se usa para convertir a sonido con calidad de CD, pero con el cdec con prdida AAC. selo para preparar archivos que se copiarn a dispositivos que solamente conocen el cdec AAC. Tenga en cuenta que el uso de este formato podra ser ilegal en su jurisdiccin; contacte con su abogado para obtener ms informacin.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Password to pass as authentication when doing HTTP proxying.

locale.name: C
locale.long: User name to pass as authentication when doing HTTP proxying.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The machine name to proxy HTTP through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: This key contains a list of hosts which are connected to directly, rather than via the proxy (if it is active). The values can be hostnames, domains (using an initial wildcard like *.foo.com), IP host addresses (both IPv4 and IPv6) and network addresses with a netmask (something like 192.168.0.0/24).

locale.name: C
locale.long: The port on the machine defined by "/system/http_proxy/host" that you proxy through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, then connections to the proxy server require authentication. The username/password combo is defined by "/system/http_proxy/authentication_user" and "/system/http_proxy/authentication_password".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Enables the proxy settings when accessing HTTP over the Internet.

locale.name: C
locale.long: URL that provides proxy configuration values.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The machine name to proxy FTP through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The port on the machine defined by "/system/proxy/ftp_host" that you proxy through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Select the proxy configuration mode. Supported values are "none", "manual", "auto".

locale.name: C
locale.long: The machine name to proxy secure HTTP through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The port on the machine defined by "/system/proxy/secure_host" that you proxy through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The machine name to proxy socks through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The port on the machine defined by "/system/proxy/socks_host" that you proxy through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The Windows networking workgroup or domain that the user is part of. In order for a new workgroup to fully take effect the user may need to log out and log back in.

value.string: Se usa para convertir a sonido con calidad de CD, pero con el cdec con prdida AAC. selo para preparar archivos que se copiarn a dispositivos que solamente conocen el cdec AAC. Tenga en cuenta que el uso de este formato podra ser ilegal en su jurisdiccin; contacte con su abogado para obtener ms informacin.
Usado para convertir a sonido de calidad de CD, pero con un cdec de compresin sin prdida. Use esto si quiere editar luego el archivo o grabarlo en un CD.
Usado para convertir el sonido a calidad de CD, pero con un cdec de compresin con prdida. Use este para extraccin de CD y grabaciones de radio.

Se utiliza para convertir a sonido con calidad de CD, pero con el cdec con prdidas MP2. Utilice esto para preparar archivos que se copiarn a dispositivos que solamente conocen el cdec MP2. Tenga en cuenta que el uso de este formato podra ser ilegal en su jurisdiccin; contacte con su abogado para obtener ms informacin.
audio/x-raw,rate=44100,channels=2 ! twolame name=enc mode=0 bitrate=192 ! id3v2mux

Se usa para convertir a sonido con calidad de CD, pero con el cdec con prdida MP3. selo para preparar archivos que se copiarn a dispositivos que solamente conocen el cdec MP3. Tenga en cuenta que el uso de este formato podra ser ilegal en su jurisdiccin; contacte con su abogado para obtener ms informacin.
audio/x-raw,rate=44100,channels=2 ! lamemp3enc name=enc target=0 quality=6 ! xingmux ! id3v2mux
Usado para convertir en sonido de calidad de voz sin prdida. Use ste para grabar y editar voz.
Usado para convertirse en sonido de calidad de voz con prdida. Use ste para grabar voz que no necesite editarse.
